general_details.the_light_tank_7_tp__single_turret___it_:
The Light Tank 7 TP (single turret), it was based on the  Light Tank chassis and was in use from 1937. It was commonly called a single turret.


      
      
      
   General Details (Light Tank)
           Specifications    Operational Date(s)1937    Ordnance classification     Quantity Produced0    Weightunknown    Crew3    M.G's small1    M.G's large(>10mm)n/a    Length4.65 mtr    Width2.43 mtr    Height2.15 mtr    Engine Details/Performance    Max Road Speed20 mph    Max Cross Country Speedunknown    Range Road0 miles    Range Cross Countryunknown    Fuel TypeUnknown    Fuel Capacityunknown    Horse Power0 hp    Power/Weightunknown              General Information    The Light Tank 7 TP (single turret), it was based on the  Light Tank chassis and was in use from 1937. It was commonly called a single turret.It was armed with 1 light machine gun. Its main armament consisted  of a 37mm Bofors L/45 which could penetrate 34 mm of flat plate at 800 metres
